channel.title: [317]SolutionX[317]
channel.description:
Hi guys. I'm here to talk about an awesome server named 'SolutionX'.
About our community: We have a really nice community that is always there to help you out. This means that players are able to help other players out. This makes sure that you experience the best gaming time. though the community aint that big yet. And that is why we need you!
About the server: SolutionX is a 317 based server. The server is new, so it is still a little bit rough. So we would like your opinions about stuff like: skilling, pvm, etc... New ideas are always welcome! Also the voting system works 100%!
Monsters (PVM) - Graardor - Chaos elemental - King black dragon - Kalphite queen - Dagganoth kings - Zombie champion - Gian mole - Kree'arra - Evil chicken - Dagganoth mom
Skilling teleports: - varrock - mining guild - falador mines - runite ores - crafting - runecrafting - agility -woodcutting
Donations: As you may know, donations are always helpful to help the server out. Especially to a new server a we are. So donations are always welcome. But ofcourse your money doesn't go to waste. We use it to make the server more secure (safe) and more enjoyable to play for you guys. And now you may think, 'do we get anything if we donate?'. Well YES you do get something indeed.
Things you get if you donate: - Donator status, Super donator status or Elite donator status. - New commands (food, unskull, login message, custom tag) - Donator points (you will be able to buy armour wepons etc in the donator shop).
The donator status: - New food (manta rays) - Donator points
The super donator status: - New and better food (rocktails) - Other type of new foor (choco bombs: less delay while eating) - Custom tag
The elite donator status: - Even new and better food! ( coocked karambwans) - Loginmessage
Pictures of the forums:
Donator store. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QztZLxC.png?1[/img]
Shops. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QztZLxC.png?1[/img]
Bosses:
Graardor. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/27po5Kx.png?1[/img]
Giant mole. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Nqv3gO.png?1[/img]
Chaos elemental. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4xzpb2y.png?1[/img]
If you want to discover all the rest that this server has to offer. Come and join SolutionX!
Forums: [url=http://solutionx.biz/index.php]SolutionX[/url]
Webclient: [url=http://solutionx.biz/Webclient/]SolutionX[/url]
I really hope you guys join this server!
Kind regards, The staff team and the whole community.

item.title: [317]SolutionX[317]
item.dc:creator: @SolutionX317 SolutionX317
item.description:
@SolutionX317 wrote:

Hi guys.
I’m here to talk about an awesome server named ‘SolutionX’.

About our community:
We have a really nice community that is always there to help you out. This means that players are able to help other players out. This makes sure that you experience the best gaming time.
though the community aint that big yet. And that is why we need you!

About the server:
SolutionX is a 317 based server. The server is new, so it is still a little bit rough. So we would like your opinions about stuff like: skilling, pvm, etc… New ideas are always welcome!
Also the voting system works 100%!

Monsters (PVM)

  • Graardor
  • Chaos elemental
  • King black dragon
  • Kalphite queen
  • Dagganoth kings
  • Zombie champion
  • Gian mole
  • Kree’arra
  • Evil chicken
  • Dagganoth mom

Skilling teleports:

  • varrock
  • mining guild
  • falador mines
  • runite ores
  • crafting
  • runecrafting
  • agility
    -woodcutting

Donations:
As you may know, donations are always helpful to help the server out. Especially to a new server a we are. So donations are always welcome. But ofcourse your money doesn’t go to waste. We use it to make the server more secure (safe) and more enjoyable to play for you guys. And now you may think, ‘do we get anything if we donate?’. Well YES you do get something indeed.

Things you get if you donate:

  • Donator status, Super donator status or Elite donator status.
  • New commands (food, unskull, login message, custom tag)
  • Donator points (you will be able to buy armour wepons etc in the donator shop).

The donator status:

  • New food (manta rays)
  • Donator points

The super donator status:

  • New and better food (rocktails)
  • Other type of new foor (choco bombs: less delay while eating)
  • Custom tag

The elite donator status:

  • Even new and better food! ( coocked karambwans)
  • Loginmessage

Pictures of the forums:

Donator store.

Shops.

Bosses:

Graardor.

Giant mole.

Chaos elemental.

If you want to discover all the rest that this server has to offer. Come and join SolutionX!

Forums: SolutionX

Webclient: SolutionX

I really hope you guys join this server!

Kind regards,
The staff team and the whole community.
